医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Trametinib 在治疗儿童严重肥厚型心肌病方面显示出前景根据今天发表在《JACC：基础到转化科学》上的一项研究，Trametinib 是一种丝裂原激活蛋白激酶 (MEK) 抑制剂，可降低由 RAS/MAPK 通路致病性变异引起的严重肥厚性心肌病 (HCM) 儿童的死亡率和发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Trametinib-shows-promise-in-treating-severe-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Trametinib-shows-promise-in-treating-severe-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1d37e49-af27-4474-bead-faa842822554 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 11:22:20 -0500 Trametinib shows promise in treating severe hypertrophic cardiomyopathy in children
单剂量疟疾疫苗提供前所未有的 90% 保护疟疾疫苗试验的结果表明，GA2 免疫提供了显着的保护，为更有效的疫苗接种策略铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Single-dose-malaria-vaccine-offers-unprecedented-9025-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Single-dose-malaria-vaccine-offers-unprecedented-9025-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29f464f4-9006-4869-904d-66df2fc7ca7e Wed, 08 Jan 2025 10:46:00 -0500 Single-dose malaria vaccine offers unprecedented 90% protection
超过一半的美国大学生经历过与酒精相关的伤害根据 20 年来首次针对此类伤害进行的全国性概率调查，超过一半的美国大学生遭受过他人造成的与酒精相关的伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Over-half-of-US-college-students-experience-alcohol-lated-harms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Over-half-of-US-college-students-experience-alcohol-lated-harms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f2c1adb-4614-49e1-889a-88e283c7a2f2 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 09:23:22 -0500 Over half of US college students experience alcohol-related harms
研究表明类淋巴系统损伤与血管性痴呆有关南加州大学凯克医学院的一项新研究在四个不同的组中测试了与血管性痴呆相关的生物标志物，并提出了认知障碍如何产生的解释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-links-glymphatic-system-damage-to-angio-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-links-glymphatic-system-damage-to-angio-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ce33c8e-fc60-4336-8fc4-b8f9afeb93b9 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 07:26:52 -0500 Study links glymphatic system damage to vascular dementia
医疗补助扩大辩论将影响蒙大拿州立法机构讨论的其他卫生政策问题2019 年法案的最后一刻修改为蒙大拿州医疗补助扩展计划设定了结束日期，为预计 2025 年蒙大拿州立法机构最重要的医疗保健辩论奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Medicaid-expansion-debate-will-affect-other-health-policy-issues-before-Montana-legislature.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Medicaid-expansion-debate-will-affect-other-health-policy-issues-before-Montana-legislature.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b4e7e87-ea98-4d4c-bcc7-aa9e99cbf121 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 06:11:24 -0500 Medicaid expansion debate will affect other health policy issues before Montana legislature
印第安纳州参议员提议废除他帮助制定的医院垄断法印第安纳州特雷霍特竞争对手之间的医院合并失败后，一位州参议员提出了一项法案，禁止未来发生类似的合并。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Indiana-State-senator-moves-to-scrap-hospital-monopoly-law-he-helped-create.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Indiana-State-senator-moves-to-scrap-hospital-monopoly-law-he-helped-create.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=279c4914-e3a7-497f-9c29-978f5e6bfb61 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 05:54:07 -0500 Indiana State senator moves to scrap hospital monopoly law he helped create
这些富含蔬菜的布朗尼蛋糕可能正是您饮食所需的游戏规则改变者！研究人员修改了传统的布朗尼蛋糕配方，用植物成分代替黄油。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/These-veggie-packed-brownies-might-just-be-the-game-changer-your-diet-needs!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/These-veggie-packed-brownies-might-just-be-the-game-changer-your-diet-needs!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=928d078c-ce4d-439a-b322-8e11f2ad5d62 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 05:54:00 -0500 These veggie-packed brownies might just be the game-changer your diet needs!
多语言能力可增强自闭症儿童的执行功能并减少核心症状一项研究表明，多语言接触可以增强自闭症儿童的执行功能和换位思考能力，强调了其潜在的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Multilingualism-boosts-executive-function-and-reduces-core-symptoms-in-children-with-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Multilingualism-boosts-executive-function-and-reduces-core-symptoms-in-children-with-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=018da925-cd06-4c1b-8942-ab5def9af251 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 05:25:00 -0500 Multilingualism boosts executive function and reduces core symptoms in children with autism
Paxlovid 扩展课程对长期新冠症状表现出好坏参半的结果一项研究表明，较长时间的 Paxlovid 治疗可以改善某些患者的长期新冠症状，这凸显了定制抗病毒策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Extended-Paxlovid-courses-show-mixed-results-for-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Extended-Paxlovid-courses-show-mixed-results-for-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f437ee6-32ed-4172-be2d-c262d871aab4 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 04:44:00 -0500 Extended Paxlovid courses show mixed results for long COVID symptoms
新研究重新审视了药物开发成本的争论兰德公司的一项新研究表明，开发新药物的典型成本可能并不像人们普遍认为的那么高，一些极其昂贵的药物扭曲了公众对药物研发成本的讨论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-research-reframes-the-debate-on-drug-development-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-research-reframes-the-debate-on-drug-development-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=104c0851-2e15-460d-8fd7-85be2f0eb0d4 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 02:51:33 -0500 New research reframes the debate on drug development costs
